item.title: Introducing my favourite band: Re-Tros
item.description: Content 1 Introduction ​ 1.1 Band Name 2 Musical Works ​ 2.1 Early Stage ​ 2.2 First Album: Cut off! ​ 2.3 Second Albem: Watch Out! Climate Has Changed, Fat Mum Rises… ​ 2.4 Third Albem: Before the Appluse 3 Discussion ​ 3.1 My music taste before I start listening Re-tros 4 Conclusion First Header Second Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell 1 Introduction Re-tros, or their full name, Rebuilding the Rights of Statues, is a band from Beijing, China, with three members, Hua Dong, Liu Ming, and Huang Jin.
